titles = “@COLOURHEREFIRST3LETTERS@[TITLEHERE]@TEXTCOLOURHERE@”;
}

Heres an example:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Jarrod”)){
titles ="@red@[OWNER]@bla@";

item.title: Yell Tags
item.dc:creator: @Cali_Tree Cali Tree
item.description:
@Cali_Tree wrote:

I’m using a Delta. It’s a starting server for me but I want to give people custom titles. When I had this server before one of my friends added something to my Client.Java File to let me give people custom titles.

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Moderator]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@yel@[Owner]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "@blu@[Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Mod/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@yel@[Owner/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@blu@[Super Donator]-@gre@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Mod/Super Donator]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Super Donator]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@bla@[Owner/Super Donator]-@dbl@ ";
            }
            yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));

}[/code]

Does Anyone know what to add so I can give people titles?

Would this Work?

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Name Here")) { titles = "[Main Owner]-";

Read full topic
